outcome: A sudden BCI scoring fluctuation demotes high-ranking citizens, including Council-tier administrators, to low compliance. The BCI begins auto-flagging previously trusted individuals as 'outliers.' New power struggles erupt, with restored citizens inexplicably immune. A silent purge of political influence reshapes the power structure.

events.description: Council-tier accounts plummet to low BCI scores overnight. Internal system notices cite 'statistical normalization.' Shock disrupts operations as high-control privileges are denied.
Restored citizens maintain perfect scores despite erratic system checks. Directorate, Harmonists, and Innovators secretly trade accusations—no faction can explain the scoring pattern shifts.
Large groups of former administrators and officers are quietly locked out of government systems and jobs. Restored citizens quickly promoted to fill vacancies, deepening public suspicion and unrest.

A mass demonstration erupts in the old administrative sector as recently purged officials protest their demotion. BCI assigns protestors dangerously low scores, making them targets for automated restrictions.
